articles.title: Drone footage shows scope of damage from flooding - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Joe Johns reports from eastern Kentucky, which has experienced historic flooding and is bracing for more.

articles.author: By Adrienne Vogt
articles.title: Live updates: Deadly flooding in eastern Kentucky
articles.description: At least 25 people have died due to flooding in eastern Kentucky, with the death toll expected to rise, according to Gov. Andy Beshear. Follow here for live news updates.
articles.content:
Four of the children who were found dead in Knott County following the devastating flooding in eastern Kentucky were siblings, their aunt Brandi Smith told CNN on Friday.
Smith is the sister of the … [+1061 chars]

articles.title: One ticket in Illinois won the second-largest Mega Millions jackpot of an estimated $1.28 billion
articles.description: One ticket in Illinois claimed the second-largest Mega Millions jackpot of an estimated $1.28 billion during Friday night's drawing, according to the Illinois Lottery.

articles.author: Aya Elamroussi and Andy Rose, CNN
articles.title: Death toll from Kentucky flooding 'could potentially double' as people in stricken areas remain hard to reach, governor says
articles.description: After days of fatal flooding washed away parts of eastern Kentucky and claimed the lives of at least 16 people, first responders will continue working Saturday to account for missing residents, the state's governor said.
articles.content: (CNN)After days of fatal flooding washed away parts of eastern Kentucky and claimed the lives of at least 16 people, first responders will continue working Saturday to account for missing residents, … [+5128 chars]

articles.author: Tim Lister and Josh Pennington, CNN
articles.title: Russia is recruiting thousands of volunteers to replenish its ranks in Ukraine. Prior experience isn't always required
articles.description: Across Russia, volunteer battalions are being formed to deploy to the war in Ukraine, joining the so-called "special military operation" declared by President Vladimir Putin in February.

articles.author: Caroll Alvarado, Sharif Paget and Christina Maxouris, CNN
articles.title: A 17-year-old swam out of her flooded home with her dog and waited for hours on a roof to be rescued
articles.description: Early Thursday morning, 17-year-old Chloe Adams woke up to a nightmare. Rushing waters were coming out of the bathroom drains, bubbling up through the kitchen tiles and quickly surrounding her home.

articles.title: Alex Jones' company files for bankruptcy amid Texas trial to award damages to Sandy Hook families

articles.author: Payton Major, Judson Jones
articles.title: Extreme heat, flash drought and more flash flooding are all on tap this weekend. See if you're affected
articles.description: Heat alerts are extended through Sunday in the Pacific Northwest, flash-drought conditions will worsen across the southern Plains, and the Mid-South is bracing for more weekend rainfall following days of devastating floods.
articles.content:
Extreme heat or flooding could affect your weekend.

articles.author: Angela Fritz, CNN Senior Climate Editor
articles.title: Tips for staying safe in flooding: Keep an ax in the attic
articles.description: There is no more dangerous time for severe weather than after dark. You can't see the storm coming. You can't see the water rising. And, if it's late enough, you're not awake to hear the warnings.

articles.author: Dianne Gallagher and  Jacquelyne Germain, CNN
articles.title: An entire North Carolina police department resigned after a Black woman town manager was hired
articles.description: The mass exodus of an entire police department after the hiring of a Black town manager in North Carolina has opened a conversation about public safety and race relations in a small town of just over 1,500 residents.
